metadata.description: Workflow and documentation skills for structured software development: feature lifecycle (diagnose, brainstorm, plan, execute, review) and documentation lifecycle (audit, write, ADR)

plugins.name: workflow
plugins.description: Complete feature development workflow: diagnose (bug investigation with adaptive triage), brainstorm (idea to validated design), plan (design to implementation plan), beads (plan to intent-based tasks), execute (tasks to working code), review (parallel agent code review), compound (capture learnings). Requires br (beads-rust) CLI for task management.

plugins.name: docs
plugins.description: Documentation lifecycle skills: audit existing docs for gaps and staleness (docs:audit), generate and update documentation from templates (docs:write), record architectural decisions using MADR (docs:adr). Supports Diataxis framework, AI-optimization files (CLAUDE.md, AGENTS.md, llms.txt), architecture docs (C4, arc42), and project files (README, CONTRIBUTING).
